location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Summaries of official secret despatches from the Government of India, the Government of Bombay, and HM Minister to Persia

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 72; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file consists of summaries of official secret despatches from the Government of India, the Government of Bombay, and British diplomatic and consular representatives to Persia, relating to Aden, Afghanistan, Bushire, China, Herat, Nepal, Persia, Punjab, and Sind, including details related to the British Expedition against Persia during the Anglo-Persian War (1856-1857).The date range gives the creation date of the summaries, but the summaries themselves refer to correspondence of an earlier date.
